metaDescription: Crafting bespoke websites in Sheffield. We blend stunning aesthetics with powerful functionality. Our designs are tailored to elevate your brand.

heroSection.heading: Website Design for Sheffield business
heroSection.description: Professional, mobile-friendly websites for Sheffield businesses that convert visitors into customers.

whyQashnovaSection.heading: Why Choose QashNova
whyQashnovaSection.description: We're local to Sheffield and understand what works for businesses in the Steel City. Fast response times and practical advice tailored to Sheffield customers.

bullets.label: Challenge
bullets.text: Needed a premium online presence to reflect the elegance of authentic Persian rugs.

bullets.label: Solution
bullets.text: Designed a refined, image-focused website with smooth navigation and cultural storytelling.

bullets.label: Result
bullets.text: Enhanced brand credibility and increased customer engagement online.

bullets.label: Challenge
bullets.text: Complex information about government grants was difficult for homeowners to understand.

bullets.label: Solution
bullets.text: Built a clear, user-friendly website with simple content flow and application guidance.

bullets.label: Result
bullets.text: Improved lead generation and made the grant process easier for eligible homeowners.

seoSupportSection.heading: Regional SEO & Support
seoSupportSection.description: We don't just build attractive sites â€” we make sure they can be found by Sheffield customers

faqData.title: Do you provide hosting and support?
faqData.content: Yes, we offer managed hosting, security updates and maintenance packages for all Sheffield businesses with local support.

faqData.title: Can you help with Sheffield SEO?
faqData.content: Absolutely. We optimize for Sheffield local search and help with Google Business Profile setup and local SEO strategies.

faqData.title: Do you meet Sheffield clients in person?
faqData.content: Yes, we can meet Sheffield clients for initial consultations and project discussions when needed. We're local to the area.
